page.title: 03LOCAL HISTORY CHANGING TIMES
page.content: Here we have compared the views of people of all ages,and painted a picture of how times have changed, a breif compilation of different peoples memories and opinions, and various views of life today starting with younger members of our local society. We discovered that life in general is liked by people in this area, and only a few would perfer to live in a city.The only complaints were of lack of amenities,such as a good a good bus service,and the preference of living in a larger village to satisfy such needs as discos,which do not occur often in the rural Litcham area,certainly not in the smaller villages.We found that pocket-money averages at around 2 pounds a week, and is usually spent on such things as records and sweets.
